message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and elevate your market position. This product, while valued at $1,200,000 by you, holds an even greater significance for me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a substantial savings compared to the full value. I am confident that this investment will pay dividends in the long run, contributing to your company's growth and success. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer. I look forward to potentially working together and bringing this valuable asset into your organization.
